title: Leuktra
description: Leuktra was a settlement located in ancient Boeotia. It was located along the road leading from Thespiae to Plataea, somewhere in the vicinity of the modern town. In 371 B.C. the Thebans defeated the Spartans in a celebrated battle near the site.

properties.description: Location based on a node derived from OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of modern village of Leuctra
